backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authentication, user profiles, roles, servers, channels, messages, and audit log type definitions plus authorization mixin setup.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that passes old actor state through unchanged to the new actor structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a specific admin-only replica reset feature to its related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing app structure, hooks, UI components, and navigation logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing auth flow, backend connection banner, theme/providers, and rendering the main UI shell.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication provider handling session restoration, backend validation, login/logout, and error states.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, validating, and clearing session data from localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Hook exposing authentication context values from AuthProvider.
Layout wrapper for authentication screens with centered card UI, logo, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Handles category display, creation dialog, and drag-and-drop ordering for text and voice channels, updating server ordering via mutations.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Modal dialog allowing admins to create a new category with validation and backend action guarding.
Modal for creating text or voice channels under a category, supporting type selection and guarded backend submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Text input and action bar for composing and sending chat messages with backend validation and send shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays channel messages with auto-scrolling, header controls, and a composer, fetching messages and channel names dynamically.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with avatar, author info lookup, timestamp formatting, and member-selection behavior.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Shows searchable list of community servers, filtering based on search queries and community mode.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Displays server preview info with join button and member count, using a join-server mutation.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the home DM view, switching to the friends view when the friends tab is selected, otherwise displaying an empty DM placeholder.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a row for a friend with avatar, name, status, quick action buttons, and a menu for profile or removal.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabbed friend management including online/all lists, pending requests with accept/decline, and a form to add friends by principal.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Defines the desktop layout with server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list panel.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses and renders the correct main view based on navigation state, including home, discovery, server channels, or settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Implements the mobile layout with sliding sheets for servers, channels, and members, plus a top bar and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shells depending on screen width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Displays the member list for a server with avatars and usernames, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Shows the server’s channel categories, supports category expansion, creation, admin-only drag ordering, and opening server settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Mobile top bar providing navigation buttons for servers, channels, members, and user settings, plus a title reflecting the current view.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Sidebar showing home button, ordered server list, and create-server button with backend guard handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting user to enter a display name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning or removing a user's server roles with loading and pending state management.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Right-side overlay displaying a member’s profile, roles, and optional role-management dialog.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Form dialog for creating a new server with backend-guarded submission logic.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server’s icon with selection styling and optional click handling.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a selected category, handling form input, validation, and API mutations.
Dialog allowing a channel to be moved to another category, filtering available categories and submitting a move mutation.
Panel for selecting a server member and viewing or managing their assigned roles via a separate dialog.
Displays the server’s audit log with formatted event types and timestamps, handling loading and empty states.
Manages listing and ordering of categories and channels, allowing reordering and opening a dialog to create new channels.
Page for editing server settings such as description, icon, banner, and community mode, with save functionality.
Displays a member selector and shows their assigned roles, with an option to open a dialog to manage roles.
Manages server roles, allowing creation of new roles and viewing existing ones along with a member-role assignment panel.
Shell UI for server settings with sidebar navigation and dynamic page rendering.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Admin-only section for wiping local replica data with confirmation and verification UI.
Lets users change theme preferences and adjust text scaling.
Allows users to edit profile details, username, and access admin replica reset tools if permitted.
Provides the layout and navigation for user settings, including profile, appearance, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows backend connection state with loading, error recovery instructions, and retry controls.
Renders a stage channel UI showing static speaker and audience lists with avatars and a raise-hand button.
Displays a voice channel interface with participants, mute/deafen controls, and join/leave logic tied to backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Provides a simple disabled/reason state based on backend connection status.
Wraps useSafeActor to expose backend readiness, errors, and retry functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing identity, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Returns a boolean indicating if the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Clears user authentication and React Query cache when logging out.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for backend data fetching and mutations with friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with retry and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for theming, including dark/light modes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements the login and registration UI with form handling, validation, and auth interactions.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides a React context managing navigation state such as views, selections, and settings toggles.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Handles localStorage-based notification override settings and mute checks for servers and channels.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Stores and updates app settings like theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds using context.
frontend/src/types/local.ts: Contains frontend-only type definitions for servers, channels, roles, members, and related structures.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Functions for applying, building, and merging ordering of categories and channels based on server data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Utility to find and remove a DOM element via XPath with an optional MutationObserver for continuous removal.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Provides utilities to sanitize hex color strings and determine light/dark contrast for UI text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if the operation exceeds a given duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file defining features, requests, and metadata for the Server Chat project.
